text:
Jason Marcano (30 December 1983 – 30 May 2019) was a Trinidadian footballer. He played as a forward.
Marcano was born in Arima. He played for W Connection, San Juan Jabloteh, St. Ann's Rangers and Central between 2005 and 2018. He played for Trinidad and Tobago from 2007 to 2016, making 12 appearances.
On 30 May 2019, Marcano was killed in a car crash near Arouca.
